html:
{{ letter_head }}

Patient: {{doc.patient}}

Patient Name: {{doc.patient_name}}

{{ _("Age: ") }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient" ,doc.patient , "p_age") }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient" ,doc.patient , "age_type") }}

{{ _("Mobile: ") }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient" ,doc.patient , "mobile_no") }}

{{ _("Doctor: ") }} {{ doc.practitioner }}

{{ _("Department: ") }} {{ doc.medical_department or ""}}

{{ _("Customer Group: ") }} {{ doc.customer_group }}

{% for img in doc.radiology_prescription %} {% endfor %}

{{img.idx}} {{img.image}} {{img.lab_test_comment or ''}}
